column2: 4':'醫生建議Jerry多喝一點水且多休息':3

column1: 'advisor':'n.':'提供意見者；顧問':'Ms. Green is a popular lecturer
column2: and she is also a great thesis advisor .':14::'Green女士是位受歡迎的講師，她也是位很棒的論文指導老師':3

column1: 'breath':'n.':'呼吸':'Sally is out of breath because she ran all the way from home .':4:'2
column3: 4':'Sally氣喘吁吁的，因為她一路從家裡跑到學校':3

column1: 'breathe':'vi. vt.':'呼吸':'Breathing deeply and slowly is a good way to help you get to sleep .':0::'深沉且緩慢地呼吸是幫助睡眠的一個良好方式':3
'breathe':'vi. vt.':'呼吸':'The woman breathed a sigh of relief when she got the first message sent by her astronaut husband from space .':2:'2
column5: 6':'這名女人收到她的太空人丈夫從太空傳來的第一個訊息時鬆了一口氣':3

column1: 'chill':'n.':'寒冷':'Whenever I feel a chill at night
column2: I have a cup of hot cocoa .':4::'每當我在晚上感覺到寒冷時，我都會喝杯熱可可':3

column1: 'chilly':'adj.':'寒冷的':'My room gets very chilly in winter because the window faces north .':4::'我的房間因為窗戶朝北，在冬天時就會變得非常寒冷':3
'democracy':'n.':'民主制度':'We can’t say that democracy is definitely the best political form
column2: but it is better than others .':4::'我們無法說民主制度絕對是最好的政治形式，但它比其他的制度都還要好':3

column1: 'democratic':'adj.':'民主的':'I have democratic parents ; they never ask me to do anything that I don’t want .':2::'我有對民主的父母，他們不會要求我去做我不想做的事':3
'edit':'vt.':'編輯':'This photo has been edited so that the man’s wrinkles are not so obvious .':4::'這張照片已經被編修過了，所以這男人的皺紋沒有那麼明顯':3
'edition':'n.':'版本':'The author added many recent examples in the second edition of the book .':9::'在這本書的第二版，作者增加了許多最近的例子':3
'editor':'n.':'編輯':'As a chief editor
column2: Ellen can decide which books to publish .':3::'作為一位總編輯，Ellen可以決定要出版哪一本書':3

column1: 'fortune':'n.':'運氣；財富':'I am not a lucky person so I think it is not my fortune to win the lottery .':13::'我不是個幸運的人，所以我認為我沒有這個運氣可以贏得樂透':3
'fortune':'n.':'運氣；財富':'This new house is worth a fortune .':6:'4
column3: 6':'這棟新的房子值好多錢':3

column1: 'fortunate':'adj.':'幸運的':'Though we had a small fire in the kitchen
column2: it was fortunate that no serious harm was done .':12::'雖然我們在廚房發生一場小火災，但很幸運地沒有造成嚴重的傷害':3

column1: 'misfortune':'n.':'不幸':'My grandmother always prays to the gods that no misfortune will come to my family .':9::'我的祖母總是向眾神祈禱，希望不幸不會發生在我家人身上':3
'grace':'n.':'優雅':'The large white swan flew down and landed on the pond with grace .':12::'這隻大白天鵝往下飛行並優雅地降落到池塘上':3
'graceful':'adj.':'優雅的':'The audience was amazed by the ballet dancers’ graceful moves .':8::'芭蕾舞者們優雅的動作讓觀眾感到驚豔':3
'hesitate':'vi.':'猶豫':'When Tim asked his girlfriend to marry him
column2: she hesitated for a moment .':10::'當Tim要求女友嫁給他時，她猶豫了一下':3

column1: 'hesitation':'n.':'猶豫':'When he saw the little girl drowning
column2: Eddie jumped into the river without hesitation .':14:'13
column3: 14':'當Eddie 看到這個小女孩溺水時，他毫不猶豫地跳進河裡':3

column1: 'imagination':'n.':'想像':'This novel is so interesting . The story is totally beyond my imagination !':12:'10
column2: 12':'這本小說真有趣。故事內容完全超越我的想像！':3

column1: 'imaginable':'adj.':'可想像的':'This store offers chocolates in every imaginable flavor .':6::'這間商店提供了各種你可以想像到的巧克力口味':3
'imaginary':'adj.':'想像中的':'Lonely children often create imaginary friends to play with .':4::'孤獨的孩童常常會創造一些想像中的朋友一起玩樂':3
'imaginative':'adj.':'富有想像力的':'Emily is an imaginative writer and her stories provide a delightful reading experience .':3::'Emily是位富有想像力的作家，她的故事提供了人們愉快的閱讀體驗':3
'liberty':'n.':'自由':'Those who fought for liberty and justice deserve our recognition .':4::'那些為了自由與正義而奮戰的人值得我們的認可':3
'liberal':'adj.':'開放的；開明的':'Generally speaking
column2: young people tend to have more liberal beliefs than the older generation .':9::'一般來說，年輕人往往比老一輩擁有較開放的想法':3

column1: 'manufacture':'vt.':'製造':'My father’s company manufactures towels and toothbrushes .':3::'我爸爸的公司製造毛巾與牙刷':3
'manufacturer':'n.':'製造商':'The company used to be the largest manufacturer of noodles in the world .':7::'這間公司過去曾經是全世界最大的麵條製造商':3
'occasion':'n.':'場合':'I wear a suit and tie on formal occasions .':8::'在正式的場合，我會穿西裝打領帶':3
'occasional':'adj.':'偶爾的':'I only play the occasional mahjong game during family gatherings .':4::'我只有在家族聚會時，偶爾打麻將':3
'permit':'vt.':'允許':'You are not permitted to open this file unless you have the password .':3::'除非你有密碼，不然你不被允許打開這個檔案':3
'permission':'n.':'許可；准許':'Lily doesn’t do anything without her parents’ permission . She is an obedient child .':7::'Lily不會做任何沒有父母同意的事情。她是個聽話的小孩':3
'permissive':'adj.':'縱容的':'Our government has been to permissive toward factories that pollute the environment .':5::'我們的政府一直對於污染環境的工廠過於縱容':3
'recover':'vi.':'恢復；痊癒':'Andy injured his knee
column2: but luckily
column3: he recovered before the competition .':9::'Andy的膝蓋受傷了，但很幸運地，他在比賽之前康復':3

column1: 'recovery':'n.':'恢復；痊癒':'We are all glad to hear that you have made a recovery from the illness .':11:'9
column3: 11':'我們都非常開心聽到你的病已經康復了':3

column1: 'scholar':'n.':'學者':'Mr. Brown is an outstanding scholar of American history .':5::'Brown先生是一位在美國歷史領域中傑出的學者':3
'scholarship':'n.':'獎學金':'Mina is excited that she has won a scholarship to her dream .':8:'6
column3: 8':'Mina很興奮因為她得到了她夢想中大學的獎學金':3

column1: 'terror':'n.':'恐怖':'The passengers screamed in terror when they saw the big rat on the train .':4:'3
column2: 4':'當乘客們在火車上看到一隻大老鼠，他們驚恐地尖叫':3

column1: 'terrify':'vt.':'恐懼；驚嚇':'Finding a beehive on their balcony terrified Jake and Amy .':6::'Jake和Amy發現他們的陽台有蜂窩嚇壞他們了':3

'universal':'adj.':'全世界的；普遍的':'A smile is a universal body language that shows friendliness .':4::'微笑是全世界通用的肢體語言，表示友善':3
'violate':'vt.':'違反':'Our government managed to come up with an effective way to punish those who violate the traffic rules .':14::'我們的政府設法想出了有效的方法來處罰那些違反交通規則的人':3
'violation':'n.':'違反':'Drunk driving is a serious violation of the law .':5::'酒醉駕車嚴重違反了法律':3
'violence':'n.':'暴力':'A teacher has to report any signs of domestic violence on a student .':9::'老師必須要通報有任何遭受家庭暴力跡象的學生':3
'violent':'adj.':'劇烈的':'The violent storm tore off our roof
column2: and now we have nowhere to live in .':1::'這個劇烈的暴風雨吹掉了我們的屋頂，現在我們沒有地方可以住':3

column1: 'wealth':'n.':'財富':'Wealth inequality is a major problem in our society .':0:'0
column2: 1':'貧富不均是我們社會上一個重大的問題':3

column1: 'wealthy':'adj.':'富裕的':'This must be a wealthy neighborhood . Look how many fancy buildings there are !':4::'這一定是個富有的地區。看這裡有許多華麗的建築物':3
'admire':'vt.':'欽佩':'I really admire Serena for her confidence and courage .':2:'2
column2: 4':'我非常欽佩Serena的自信與勇氣':4

column1: 'admiration':'n.':'欽佩':'The audience clapped with admiration when the singer finished her song .':4::'在這位歌手唱定歌曲之後，觀眾非常讚賞地拍手叫好':4
'admirable':'adj.':'可欽佩的':'It was really admirable that you sacrificed so much of your free time for the project .':3::'你願意為這個計劃犧牲這麼多的個人休閒時間，真是令人敬佩':4
'analyze':'vt.':'分析':'Learning to analyze things from a different viewpoint can help you develop problem-solving skills .':2::'學習從不同角度來分析事情能幫助你增強解決問題的技巧':4
'analysis':'n.':'分析':'We need to wait for the analysis of your physical examination to identify your health problems .':6::'我們需要等待你健康檢查的分析來確認你的健康問題':4
'circulate':'vi.':'循環；流傳':'This kind of fan helps the air circulate in a room .':7::'這種風扇幫助房內空氣循環':4
'circulate':'vi.':'循環；流傳':'Rumors circulate quickly
column2: especially with the use of social networks .':1::'謠言流傳得很快，尤其是透過社群網路':4

column1: 'circulation':'n.':'循環；流傳':'Regular exercise and a healthy diet can improve one’s blood circulation .':10::'規律運動與健康的飲食能夠改善一個人的血液循環':4
'circular':'adj.':'圓的':'The traditional Chinese dining table is circular
column2: which means reunion .':6::'傳統的中國餐桌是㘣形的，意味著團圓':4

column1: 'civil':'adj.':'市民的':'The law protects our civil rights
column2: and no one should break it .':4::'這條法律保障了我們身為市民的權利，沒有人可以觸犯它':4

column1: 'civilian':'n.':'市民':'More than ten civilians were harmed in the accidental gas explosion .':3::'在這場意外的瓦斯爆炸中，有超過十位市民受傷':4
'demonstrate':'vt.':'示範；顯示':'The flight attendant stood in front of the passengers to demonstrate the safety rules .':10::'這位空服員站在乘客前面示範安全規則':4
'demonstrate':'vt.':'示範；顯示':'His performance clearly demonstrated that he has the ability to do this job well .':3::'他的表現清楚地顯示出他足以勝任這份工作':4
'demonstration':'n.':'示範；示威':'I still don’t know this yoga move . Can you give me a demonstration ?':13::'我仍然不知道這個瑜珈動作。你可以示範給我看嗎？':4
'demonstration':'n.':'示範；示威':'William will participate in a demonstration against gun violence weekend .':5::'William這週末將會參加一場示威活動，抗議槍枝暴力':4
'depart':'vi.':'啟程；出發':'Attention ! The flight will depart in fifteen minutes .':5::'注音！班機將會在15分鐘後啟程':4
'departure':'n.':'啟程；出發':'Our flight departure time has been delayed due to bad weather . Fortunately
column2: we only waited for an hour .':2::'我們的班機啟程時間因為天氣不好而被延後了。很幸運地，我們只等了一個小時':4

column1: 'educate':'vt.':'教育':'The grahams have educated their children well ; they behave well in school .':3::'Graham夫婦把子女教育得很好，他們在學校表現良好':4
'educational':'adj.':'教育的':'There are many good TV programs that are both interesting and educational .':11::'有很多好的電視節目不僅很有趣而且富有教育意義':4
'found':'vt.':'創立；建立':'Our school was founded in 1899 . It has a long history .':3::'我們的學校創立於1899年，有悠久的歷史':4
'foundation':'n.':'創設；基金會':'Since the foundation of this organization
column2: we have helped lots of people recover from a variety of diseases .':2::'自從這個機構的創設，我們已經幫助很多人從各式各樣的疾病中康復':4

column1: 'foundation':'n.':'創設；基金會':'My sister works for a foundation that helps low-income families and homeless people .':5::'我姐姐在一個基金會工作，這個基金會幫助低收入家庭與無家可歸的人':4
'founder':'n.':'創辦者':'Jeff Bezos is the founder of the largest online bookstore in the world .':4::'Jeff Bezos他是全世界最大網路書店的創辦人':4
'grammar':'n.':'文法':'Hugh enjoys doing English speaking and listening exercises
column2: but he finds grammar exercises very difficult .':12::'Hugh喜歡做英文口說與聽力的練習，但他覺得文法練習很困難':4

column1: 'grammatical':'adj.':'文法上的':'Mike was so hasty when he wrote his homework that he made many grammatical mistakes .':13::'Mike在做功課時太過匆忙，以致於犯了很多文法上的錯誤':4
'historian':'n.':'歷史學家':'David Hume is a well-known historian whose works are very influential .':5::'David Hume 是一位知名的歷史學家，他的作品非常具有影響力':4
'historic':'adj.':'歷史性的':'The day that women won the right to vote was a historic moment for humankind .':11::'女性獲得投票權的那天是人類史上歷史性的一刻':4
'historical':'adj.':'歷史的':'Fort San Domingo is a famous historical building in Tamsui .':6::'淡水的紅毛城是一個很有名的歷史建築物':4
'intend':'vt.':'意圖':'I am sorry to make you feel uncomfortable . That wasn’t what I intended .':13::'我非常抱歉讓你感到不舒服，那不是我的本意':4
'intention':'n.':'意圖；目的':'She is full of good intentions
column2: though sometimes her actions cause trouble .':5::'她有許多的良善意圖，雖然有時候她的行動會造成麻煩':4

column1: 'indoor':'adj.':'室內的':'People prefer doing indoor activities in winter because it is too cold to go outside .':3::'在冬天時因為外面天氣太冷而無法外出，所以人們比較喜歡從事室內活動':4
'indoors':'adv.':'在屋內':'When there is a typhoon
column2: one should stay indoors and prepare food and fresh water .':9::'當颱風來臨時，我們應該待在室內並準備好食物和乾淨的水':4

column1: 'literature':'n.':'文學':'Romeo and Juliet is a classic of Western literature .':8::'「羅密歐與茱麗葉」是西方文學中的經典作品':4
'literary':'adj.':'文學的':'Though she is a famous author
column2: she has not won any important literary prizes yet .':13::'雖然她是位知名的作家，但她尚未贏得過任何重要的文學獎項':4

column1: 'mathematics':'n.':'數學':'Susie finds mathematics quite difficult
column2: but she still tries her best to learn it .':2::'Susie覺得數學相當困難，但她仍然盡全力學習':4

column1: 'mathematical':'adj.':'數學的；數理的':'Isaac is a genius . He came up with many important mathematical theories .':11::'Isaac是個天才。他提出許多重要的數學理論':4
'offend':'vt.':'冒犯':'I am sorry for what I said . I didn’t mean to offend you .':12::'很抱歉我對你說了那些話，我不是故意要冒犯你的':4
'offense':'n.':'違法行為':'Driving under the influence of alcohol is a serious offense .':9::'酒後駕駛是嚴重的違法行為':4
'offensive':'adj.':'無禮的；冒犯的':'I don’t find this show funny at all . On the contrary
column2: I think the jokes are quite offensive .':19::'我一點也不覺得這個表演好笑。相反地，我認為其中的笑話相當無禮':4

column1: 'persuade':'vt.':'說服；使相信':'The lawyer tried very hard to persuade the judge that the man did not steal anything from the jewelry store .':6::'這位律師非常努力試圖說服法官這位男子並未從珠寶店偷走任何東西':4
'persuasion':'n.':'說服；說服力':'Persuasion is a powerful tool
column2: in politics as well as business .':0::'說服力是很強大的工具，無論是在政治或是商場上':4

column1: 'persuasive':'adj.':'有說服力的':'My husband is a persuasive speaker . He can always talk me into making decisions when I hesitate .':4::'我的丈夫講話非常有說服力，每當我猶豫時，他總是能說服我做出決定':4
'reduce':'vt.':'減輕；減少':'Research shows that doing housework can actually reduce stress .':7::'研究顯示做家事確實可以減少壓力':4
'reduction':'n.':'縮小；削減':'The reduction in the number of bees forces us to pay more attention to climate change .':1::'蜜蜂數量的減少迫使我們更關注氣候變遷的問題':4
'urge':'vt.':'呼籲':'The environmental organization urges the government to deal with the problem of food waste .':3::'這個環境組織呼籲政府處理食物浪費的問題':4
'urgent':'adj.':'緊急的；迫切的':'I must talk to the principal now . Please tell him that this is an urgent matter .':15::'我必須要跟校長說話。請告訴他這是一件緊急的事情':4
'vision':'n.':'視力；遠見':'My grandfather has gradually lost his vision over the years .':6::'這些年我的祖父逐漸地失去了他的視力':4
'vision':'n.':'視力；遠見':'The boss has won the hearts of his employees because he is a man of vision .':15::'這位上司贏得員工的心，因為他是個有遠見的人':4
'visible':'adj.':'明顯的；可見的':'I’m going to return this bag I ordered online because there is a visible black spot on it .':13::'我要將這個我在線上訂購的包包退貨，因為它上面有很明顯的黑點':4
'volunteer':'n.':'志工；自願者':'The college student applied to be an international volunteer to support local people in Africa .':8::'這位大學生申請當國際志工來幫助非洲當地的居民':4
'volunteer':'vt.':'自願':'During the preparation for the sport events
column2: many people volunteered to help .':10::'在準備這些運動賽事的期間，許多人自願來幫忙':4

column1: 'voluntary':'adj.':'義務的；自願的':'Wilma does voluntary work at a hospital twice every month .':2::'Wilma 每個月到醫院做義務工作兩次':4
'sympathy':'n.':'同情':'I feel sympathy for all the victims who lost their homes in the earthquake .':2:'1
column3: 3':'我非常同情那些在地震時失去家園的受害者':4

column1: 'sympathetic':'adj.':'同情的':'He suffered from the same illness
column2: so he is quite sympathetic to my condition .':11::'他曾經患有同樣的疾病，所以他對我的情況感到相當同情':4

column1: 'athlete':'n.':'運動員':'Her dream as an athlete is to compete in the Olympics .':4::'她身為運動員的夢想是在奧運競賽':5
'athletic':'adj.':'體育的':'The school will hold an athletic event in the field on Saturday .':5::'這間學校這個星期六會在操場上舉辦一場運動賽事':5
'awake':'vi.':'醒來':'I awoke from a long
column2: deep sleep
column3: feeling relaxed .':1::'我睡了很久很沉，醒過來感覺很放鬆':5

column1: 'awake':'adj.':'醒著':'I was surprised to find my father will awake at 1 a.m.':8::'我發現我爸凌晨一點還醒著時很驚訝':5
'awaken':'vt.':'喚醒；使...醒':'The advertisement tries to awaken awareness of endangered animals .':4::'這支廣告試著要喚醒人們對瀕臨絕種動物的意識':5
'classify':'vt.':'分類':'These documents are classified as top secret .':3:'3
column2: 4':'這些文件被分類為最高機密':5

column1: 'classification':'n.':'分類；類別':'The librarian demonstrates to us the rules of classification for all the books in the library .':8::'圖書館員示範給我們看圖書館裡所有圖書的分類原則':5
'compete':'vi.':'競爭':'All the other teams are so strong . It is difficult to compete with them .':12:'12
column2: 13':'所有其他的隊伍都很厲害，與他們競爭相當困難':5

column1: 'competition':'n.':'競爭；比賽':'Economists believe that having competition in the market is good thing .':4::'經濟學家相信競爭對市場來說是件好事':5
'competition':'n.':'競爭；比賽':'Roger trained hard for the next tennis competition .':7::'Rogan為了下一場網球比賽認真訓練':5
'competitor':'n.':'對手；競爭者':'In the age of global community
column2: there may be competitors from all around the world for the same job .':10::'在全球共同體時代，可能會有來自全世界各地的競爭者爭取同一份工作':5

column1: 'competitive':'adj.':'競爭的':'The fashion industry is highly competitive
column2: and companies have to keep developing new products .':5::'時尚產業競爭激烈，那些公司必須持續開發新產品':5

column1: 'dependable':'adj.':'可依賴的':'Christine was chosen as class leader because she is a dependable person .':10::'Christine被選為班長因為她是個可靠的人':5

column1: 'constructive':'adj.':'建設性的':'Please accept your professor''s constructive criticism . It’s helpful for your essay . ':4::'請接受你的教授具有建設性的評論。這對你的論文有幫助':12

column1: 'consultant':'n.':'諮詢者；顧問':'Being a marriage consultant is a very popular occupation nowadays .':3::'擔任婚姻顧問是現今非常熱門的行業':12

column1: 'confident':'adj.':'充滿信心的':'The team is confident that they can beat their competitor in the game .':3::'這個隊伍有信心能打敗他們這場比賽的對手':12

column1: 'consume':'vt.':'吃；消耗':'Old cars must undergo tests to make sure they don’t consume too much gasoline .':10::'舊車必須接受檢測以確定它們沒有消耗太多汽油':12

column1: 'interrupt':'vi.':'打斷':'It is very impolite to interrupt others'' conversations . ':5::'打斷他人的對話是相當不禮貌的。':12

column1: 'instructor':'n.':'指導者':'The instructor assured the young boy that he would improve if he kept practicing . ':1::'這位指導者向這小男孩保證如果他持續練習就會進步。':12

column2: most people are concerned about the invasion of people''s privacy with technology .':8::'現今大部分的人關心利用科技對人們隱私的侵害。':12

column1: 'profit':'n.':'利益':'The man made a profit by selling his luxurious house at a high price . ':4:'2

column1: 'profitable':'adj.':'有盈利的':'The sale of electronic devices used to be a very profitable business . ':10::'販售電子產品曾經是非常賺錢的生意。':12

column1: 'respectable':'adj.':'可尊敬的':'The professor is a respectable and experienced authority in his field . ':4::'這位教授在他的領域中是位可敬且經驗豐富的權威。':12

column1: 'restriction':'n.':'限制':'Most economists believe that having fewer financial restrictions is good for the development of the market .':7::'大部分的經濟學者相信，對財務的限制愈少對市場發展有益':12

column1: 'rot':'vi.':'腐壞':'Putting the food into the freezer doesn’t mean that it won’t rot ; it can only be preserved for a longer time .':11::'把食物放進冷凍庫並不代表它不會腐壞，它只是可以保存久一點而己':13

column1: 'rust':'avi.':'生鏽':'The car has been unused for so long that it has begun to rust .':13::'這輛車太長一段時間沒有被使用，因此已經開始生鏽':13

column1: 'factor':'n.':'因素':'This is a big project
